name: super bluedude galaxy
description:
Run around on planets and use the turbo run to hop to other planets. Jump on skeletons to level up your turbo run speed to expand your reach over the galaxy. Find the shining crown and win. Do it under 1min 45sec to prove your mastery.

This game is a submission for the miz_jam1. Thank you to miziziziz and the wonderful community for organizing this game jam.

sprites and sfx are provided by kenny.nl.

music is provided by opengameart.org.
